# tyBitmap (tyFlow) â€” Property Reference
# tyFlow bitmap texture. Similar to Bitmaptexture with tyFlow sync options.
# Create: bm = tyBitmap fileName:"C:/path/to/file.png"

## Core
fileName : filename                     # full path to image file
bitmap : bitmap                         # the loaded bitmap object

## Crop / Tile
clipu : float                           # U offset
clipv : float                           # V offset
clipw : float                           # U width
cliph : float                           # V width
cropPlace : integer                     # 0=crop, 1=place
apply : boolean                         # enable cropping

## Filtering
filtering : integer                     # 0=Pyramidal, 1=Summed Area, 2=None

## Output
monoOutput : integer                    # 0=RGB Intensity, 1=Alpha
rgbOutput : integer                     # 0=Full RGB, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue
alphaSource : integer                   # 0=Image Alpha, 1=RGB Intensity, 2=None
preMultAlpha : boolean                  # premultiplied alpha

## Animation
startTime : time                        # start frame
playBackRate : float                    # playback speed multiplier
endCondition : integer                  # 0=Loop, 1=Ping Pong, 2=Hold

## tyFlow Sync
sync : boolean                          # sync to tyFlow simulation
syncChannel : integer                   # tyFlow channel index
syncChannelUnits : integer              # channel unit type

## Jitter
jitter : float
useJitter : boolean

## Sub-objects
coords : maxObject                      # UVW coordinates controller
output : maxObject                      # output rollout
